result.title: Tracked Expenses
result.content:
Tracked expenses are any expense you've told Trym to manage or track for you. This list is where trym puts the expenses which you've told it to track.

Expenses with an active Trym Request will show the status of that request to the right. Expenses without active trym requests will have a 'Trym Account' button which you can use to tell trym to stop, upgrade, downgrade, or find better deals on that account.

Adding details more to expenses in this list will allow trym alert you before future expenses and show you how much you're spending over time.
